name: Sour Banana Sherbet
description: This powerful hybrid from Crockett Family Farms is the result of crossing AJ’s Sour Diesel with Banana Sherbet. A THC content between 18% and 24% means Sour Banana Sherbet is a heavy hitter, and it reportedly makes excellent concentrates. The terpene profile is a mix of sour fruit and diesel fuel flavors. While it is very easy to grow, it will stretch a great deal, so height management techniques must be employed when growing indoors.
descriptionPlain: This powerful hybrid from Crockett Family Farms is the result of crossing AJ’s Sour Diesel with Banana Sherbet. A THC content between 18% and 24% means Sour Banana Sherbet is a heavy hitter, and it reportedly makes excellent concentrates. The terpene profile is a mix of sour fruit and diesel fuel flavors. While it is very easy to grow, it will stretch a great deal, so height management techniques must be employed when growing indoors.

highlightedReviews.text: Another feature coming from Crockett Family Farms is the ever potent and tasty Sour Banana Sherbet, crossing a cut of Sour Diesel with Banana Sherbet, Ive been very blessed to be able to try out all the new genetics and wow i am always constantly amazed on the new strains to come out... with a nice light green and white frost covers the entire bud but is wrapped all throughout with light orange hairs, being a hybrid by this strain acts like a 50/50 for me in which my head and body high match perfectly which makes a very potent stress reliever and can also help out with bits of depression, a great mood stabilizer, also a great morning or afternoon strain

Very potent and rapid-onset Sativa leaning Hybrid with surprisingly clear and mellow Indica afterglow. Novice users prone to panic and anxiety should exercise caution. Experienced users will be in for a treat! SBH will, without a doubt, cause some anxiety but it's up to you how to handle that aspect of it. Acknowledge the annoying beast for a minute or two, but don't go home with it, know what I mean? SBH is a better version of morning coffee/energy drink. If you're an artist/geek/nerd of any sort, you'll seriously fall in love with this. Even if you're not one of the creatives, you'll still reap some great benefits. 

Although it gets a bit intense at times, it's still very pleasant and very enjoyable experience. Listen to music, watch something funny, chat-up your friends/colleagues, SBH likes to be both introverted and extroverted at once. Creative? Write things, create things, they don't have to be good, just write all your ideas down, your brain will be flooded with an influx of new ideas and possibilities. 

Sour Banana Sherbet outta be listed in Top 10 Ten Strains list every single year. I hope it doesn't get too cloned like Gorilla Glue and Bruce Banner have. Is it too intense to write  'PROTECT SOUR BANANA SHERBET AT ALL COST!'? Seriously -- This is such a lovely and uplifting strain that it would be a shame to lose it. A little bit of it goes a long way. Share it with the ones you love, don't abuse it, treat it like fine Wine. Bust it out as a Specialty, because that's what it falls under. 

---

TL;DR - Tasty Sativa with a cerebral and uplifting high, suggested to experienced users. Get creative, go outside (or stay in, whatves brah), enjoy this gem.

Proudly served by Sira Naturals @ Somerville, Massachusetts.
